tool_description: An API that shows climate-related current events from news articles around the UK
name: Climate Change Feed
title: Climate Change Feed

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news related to climate-change from all sources attached.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-feed.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All News from Individual Sources
api_list.description: This endpoint will filter all the climate-change news from one specified source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-feed.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-feed.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
